name: movies-library-manager
description: Tiny movies library manager created by using React framework

scripts.compile: npm run transpiler && npm run browserify && npm run copy
scripts.start: npm run compile && npm run minifier-web && node dist/index.js
scripts.minifier-web: node node_modules/html-minifier/cli.js -c minifier.json --file-ext html --input-dir src/web --output-dir dist/public

author: Fabio Ansaldi
